original_text: So Isaac moved away from that place. He put his tents in the Valley of Gerar and he stayed there.
korean_text: 이삭이 그 곳을 떠나 그랄 골짜기에 장막을 치고 거기 거류하며

sentences.original_text: So Isaac moved away from that place.
He put his tents in the Valley of Gerar
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 장막을 게랄 골짜기에 쳤고
